casebody.data:
First Department,

December, 1975

(December 2, 1975) Gruntal and Company, Appellant, v Bernard Heller et al., Respondents.

— Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on August 15, 1975, unanimously affirmed on the opinion of Fine, J., at Special Term, without costs and without disbursements. No opinion. Concur — Stevens, P. J., Kupferman, Murphy, Lupiano and Capozzoli, JJ.
